plot: A lonely Doctor and heroin junkie strike up a series of conversations over the course of one day that lead them to some unexpected places.
title: The Cockroach
plot_es: A lonely Doctor and heroin junkie strike up a series of conversations over the course of one day that lead them to some unexpected places.
plot_en: A lonely Doctor and heroin junkie strike up a series of conversations over the course of one day that lead them to some unexpected places.
